title: I know what needs a nerf, riot's balance team

replies.body:
you don't want to nerf the balance team, that's why this happened... too many brain nerfs


They need buffs. brain buffs.

It would be perfect since riot loves to go to the extreme in their balancing.

Riot balance team IQ buffed from 10 at all levels to 1000. Will check back in 6 months to review progress.
